dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-2) is a dataset for sentiment classification on movie reviews, which are annotated with two labels (Positive and Negative).

dcterms:description: The SNIPS dataset contains 7 intents which are collected from the Snips personal voice assistant.

dcterms:description: The TREC dataset is a fine-grained question classification dataset sourced from TREC, containing six question types (whether the question is about person, location, etc.).
dcterms:title: TREC
